title: 1.12.2崩溃
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  llibrary (llibrary-core-1.0.11-1.12.2.jar)
  PhosphorFMLLoadingPlugin (phosphor-1.12.2-0.2.4+build46.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// I'm sorry, Dave.

Time: 7/24/19 3:12 AM
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

net.minecraftforge.fml.common.LoaderExceptionModCrash: Caught exception from The Twilight Forest (twilightforest)
Caused by: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Function is not supported

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
尝试删除 [暮色森林]twilightforest-1.12.2-3.8.689-universal.jar 

或者试着删除 phosphor-1.12.2-0.2.4+build46.jar

本帖最后由 1320133498 于 2019-7-24 11:59 编辑 
xmdhs 发表于 2019-7-24 11:38
尝试删除 [暮色森林]twilightforest-1.12.2-3.8.689-universal.jar 

或者试着删除 phosphor-1.12.2-0.2.4+ ...
phosphor删除后仍然崩溃,暮色森林是服务器客户端必要mod

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
1320133498 发表于 2019-7-24 11:57
phosphor删除后仍然崩溃,暮色森林是服务器客户端必要mod
那能把整合包发给我看一下吗

replies.author: mine新时代xs
replies.txt_content:
net.minecraftforge.fml.common.LoaderExceptionModCrash: Caught exception from The Twilight Forest (twilightforest)
Caused by: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Function is not supported
        at org.lwjgl.BufferChecks.checkFunctionAddress(BufferChecks.java:58)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.GL20.glCreateProgram(GL20.java:255)
嗯哼，这很明显是显卡驱动的问题啊

GL info: ' Vendor: 'Intel' Version: '1.4.0 - Build 8.14.10.1930' Renderer: 'Intel Bear Lake B'
更新你的显卡驱动或回退到稳定版本
